body:
Hello there,

I would like to let a person who controls the website to know something about the website. Whenever I am in a HTML Profile in my iPad, it lags like crazy and can barely scroll down the profile. If this is always usual, then I will just read them from my computer. 

Thanks,
clockracer.
body_tagged:

title: Laggy Profiles.

replies.body: Okay, now I know I am not the only one. Thanks for letting me know.
replies.body_tagged: Okay, now I know I am not the only one. Thanks for letting me know.

replies.body: it depends on the profile. If the hv gif''s, ya it maybe laggy or it has to many items.

replies.body: Yes, you are correct. Some profiles are not leggy and are HTML but also I have found laggy profiles without gifs.
